profile.partnerAgeBands: Who can you be matched with?

profile.teenMatchingNote: For safety, accounts in the 13‚Äì17 age range can only be matched with other 13‚Äì17 accounts in Random Chat.
profile.foriaRemember: Let Foria remember things you tell it
profile.foriaRememberDesc: When this is on, Foria can use your past Random Chat conversations (just with you) to keep the conversation flowing. You can turn this off any time.
profile.voicemailForwardEmailPlaceholder: Email to send voicemail notifications to
profile.voicemailGreetingTextDesc: Used when your audio greeting is unavailable.
profile.voicemailNote: Voicemails from your Chatforia numbers will be stored in your Voicemail inbox. You can enable transcription and forwarding in supported plans.
profile.portHint: Want to keep your current number? You can port it into Chatforia Wireless.

home.title: Home

press.title: Press
press.contactLine: For media inquiries, reach us at
press.boilerplateBody: Chatforia is a privacy-first messaging app that makes cross-language chat effortless. Messages are end-to-end encrypted by default, and built-in translation supports 100+ languages in real time. Users can enable disappearing messages, keep read receipts optional, and sync across devices. Available on iOS, Android, and the web.
press.scanTip: On desktop? Scan with your phone to get the app.

careers.title: Careers
careers.intro: We‚Äôre a small team building a private, global messenger. If you care about encryption, accessibility, and delightful UX, we‚Äôd love to hear from you.
careers.openRoles: Open roles: Engineering (Full-stack, iOS, Android), Product, Support.
careers.apply: How to apply: Email your resume/links to jobs@chatforia.com.

about.title: About Chatforia
about.description: Chatforia is a secure, multilingual messenger with end-to-end encryption, instant translation, and voice/video calling. Our mission is simple: help people connect‚Äîsafely, privately, and across languages.

values.control: Control: Disappearing messages & read receipts are optional.
values.control_aria: Control: Disappearing messages and read receipts are optional.

about.howDescription: Messages are encrypted on your device before they leave it. Translation, backups, and device sync are designed to minimize what our servers can see.

advertise.title: Advertise with Chatforia
advertise.description: Reach engaged messaging users with tasteful, brand-safe placements. We offer banner inventory in high-visibility spots, sponsorships, and house promos. Premium subscribers do not see ads.

adsense.withPubIdShort: We also serve inventory via Google AdSense. You can target Chatforia with publisher ID {{pubId}}, or use the form below for direct sponsorships.
adsense.noPubIdShort: We also serve some inventory via Google AdSense. Direct sponsorships are available‚Äîuse the form below.

advertise.noPlacementsPublic: We‚Äôre finalizing our ad inventory. Tell us about your campaign and we‚Äôll recommend placements.

why.highSession: High session frequency and dwell time in chat UI
why.sponsoredMoments: Sponsored moments (e.g., ‚ÄúStart a Chat‚Äù modal) available
why.deals: Direct deals or programmatic via AdSense/Google Ads

form.submittedMsg: Thanks! Your inquiry is on its way. We‚Äôll follow up shortly.

form.successToast: Thanks! We‚Äôll be in touch soon.
form.mailtoInfo: Opening your email client to send the inquiry‚Ä¶

small.desc: Includes 3 GB of high-speed data ‚Äî ideal for light messaging and occasional calls.

medium.desc: Includes 5 GB of high-speed data for trips, commuting, and regular VoIP calls.

large.desc: Includes 10 GB of high-speed data for heavy chat, calls, and video on the Chatforia network.

section3.title: 3) Go further
section3.item2Part1: Link additional devices and set up encrypted backups in

account.q: How do I create or recover my account?
account.a: Download the app or use web, tap ‚ÄúCreate account‚Äù, verify your email/phone. To recover, use ‚ÄúForgot password‚Äù.

privacy.a: Yes. Messages and calls are end-to-end encrypted by default. Only you and the recipient can read them.

translate.a: Enable ‚ÄúAuto-translate‚Äù in Settings ‚Üí Appearance & Language. We translate on-device where supported, otherwise through secure APIs with minimal metadata.

contact.a: Reach us at support@chatforia.com. Include screenshots and your app version.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.successMsg: Thanks‚Äîour team will reply by email.
contact.errorSend: Could not send. Please email support@chatforia.com.

intro.body: This Privacy Policy explains how Chatforia (‚Äúwe‚Äù, ‚Äúus‚Äù) collects, uses, and shares information when you use our apps and services. We design Chatforia to minimize the data we can access.

infoWeCollect.title: Information we collect
infoWeCollect.account: Account info (e.g., email/phone) to create and secure your account.
infoWeCollect.encrypted: Encrypted content (messages/calls) is end-to-end encrypted; we can‚Äôt read it.
infoWeCollect.diagnostics: Diagnostic/usage like crash logs, device type, or coarse analytics to improve performance.

howWeUse.title: How we use information
howWeUse.provide: Provide and secure the service (auth, spam/abuse detection).

sharing.title: Sharing
sharing.body: We don‚Äôt sell personal data. We may share limited data with processors (e.g., push notifications, analytics) under strict contracts.

rights.title: Your rights
rights.body: Depending on your region (e.g., GDPR/UK GDPR/CPRA), you may request access, correction, deletion, or opt-out of certain processing. Contact: privacy@chatforia.com.

retention.title: Data retention & security
retention.body: We retain only what‚Äôs needed to operate the service and apply industry-standard security. E2E content can‚Äôt be decrypted by us.

children.title: Children
children.body: Chatforia isn‚Äôt directed to children under 13 (or as required by your local law).

changes.title: Changes
changes.body: We‚Äôll post updates here and revise the ‚ÄúLast updated‚Äù date.

intro.body: By using Chatforia you agree to these Terms. If you do not agree, don‚Äôt use the service.

accounts.title: Accounts
accounts.itemAccurateInfo: Provide accurate info and keep credentials secure.
accounts.itemResponsibility: You‚Äôre responsible for activity on your account.

acceptableUse.title: Acceptable use
acceptableUse.itemNoAbuse: No illegal, abusive, or infringing content; no spam or automated abuse.

yourContent.title: Your content
yourContent.body: You retain rights to your content. You grant us necessary rights to operate the service (e.g., routing, storage, translation).

disclaimer.title: Disclaimers & liability
disclaimer.body: Service is provided ‚Äúas is‚Äù without warranties. To the fullest extent permitted by law, Chatforia isn‚Äôt liable for indirect or consequential damages.

changes.title: Changes
changes.body: We may update these terms; continued use after changes means acceptance.

doNotSell.title: Do Not Sell or Share My Personal Information
doNotSell.body: Chatforia does not sell personal information. California residents can still submit requests under CPRA using the button below.

cookies.title: Cookie Settings
cookies.body: Chatforia uses minimal cookies (e.g., session, security). We don‚Äôt use third-party ads cookies. Manage cookies via your browser‚Äôs settings.

Visual alerts for messages & calls

Flash screen on incoming call

accessibilitySettings.visualAlertsDesc: Show banners and title blink so you don‚Äôt miss activity.
accessibilitySettings.flashOnCallDesc: Brief bright flash when a call rings.

privacySection.ciphertextOnlyNote: Store only ciphertext on the server. Disables AI/Translate and moderation previews.

randomChat.title: Random Chat
randomChat.description: Meet someone new instantly. We‚Äôll match you and open a temporary chat room.
randomChat.saveGuard: Only human-to-human chats can be saved
randomChat.ageDisclaimer: We only store an age range (not your exact date of birth). This is used to keep Random Chat pairings reasonable. To match with people (not just RiaBot), set your age band in Settings ‚Üí Age & Random Chat.
randomChat.ageBandRequired: Set your age range in Profile ‚Üí Age & Random Chat to be matched with people.
randomChat.ageBandCallout: To match with people (not just RiaBot), set your age band in Settings ‚Üí Age & Random Chat.
